description: This table stores the hospital accounts that are associated with a given Hospital Billing statement print record.

columns.name: HBP_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the bill print record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NUM_PREV_STMTS_SENT
columns.description: The number of previous statements sent.

columns.name: PRIM_DX_ID
columns.description: Stores the primary diagnosis for the hospital billing statement/detail bill print record.

columns.name: NEW_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The new charge amount since the last statement.

columns.name: NEW_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The new payment amount since the last statement.

columns.name: NEW_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The new adjustment amount since the last statement.

columns.name: CURR_BAL
columns.description: The current balance on the hospital account.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_INIT_BAL
columns.description: The initial balance on the payment plan.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_REMAINING_BAL
columns.description: The remaining balance on the payment plan.

columns.name: IS_INFORMATIONAL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not the hospital account is on an informational statement.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: SELFPAY_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The self-pay status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Full Self-Pay Due


Review


Payment Plan


Pre-collection


Bad Debt


Prorated

columns.name: SP_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The self-pay follow-up level.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Level 1


Level 2


Level 3


Level 4


Level 5


Level 6


Level 7


Level 8


Level 9


Level 10

columns.name: COLLECTION_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The collection status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active AR


External Agency AR


Bad Debt


Outsourced

columns.name: COLL_AGENCY_ID_COLL_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the collection agency.

columns.name: IS_OUTSOURCED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not the hospital account has been outsourced.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_INFORMATIONAL_YN
